title: Skin Idea - Secret Agent Heimerdinger
body:
I was thinking of Secret Agent Heimer, I have no plans physically drawn but I have ideas in the back of my head
1. Turret is a briefcase that opens up to reveal a turret, when it disables it shuts into a briefcase.
2. Missiles are regular missiles, maybe black and white
3. His grenade is a flashbang
4. Ult is the same thing.
Heimerdinger should be dressed in a tuxedo or black and white suit, his goggles replaced with cool black shades.
Just an idea guys I have no plans on paper, just sitting in my head and decided to share.
Please make this a thing :)
